overview: Good Placement Of Seeds is a stop motion style 3D animation made by Xi Chen. A person places scattered seeds in an orderly manner, the scattered seeds are neatly arranged by this person. Arranging the seeds and applauding the Frogs will be followed by physical and narrative results. The shape of horror comes from the form in which the seeds were laid out. In this film, viewers can literally watch someone plant the "seeds" to create a situation in which the Placement Of The Seeds is certain to happen.​​
title: Good Placement Of Seeds
